_header: If death would come and shew his face
Subjects: death, power of; death, longing for

BodEngPoetb5.First Lines:
If death wovld come and shew his faceAs he doth shew his
                    power…
BodEngPoetb5.Last Lines:
…Þat death can nevere come to sooneVnto a minde
                    prepard
BodEngPoetb5.Editions:
Gray,  Douglas. 
             “Two Songs of Death.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         64 (1963): 354-64: 67-71.
